keyFacts: The invoice is dated July 5, 2004, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD 268.91.
The invoice includes details of multiple shipments made by Epstein, with specific dates of pickup and delivery.
Discounts totaling $26.27 were applied to the invoice.
The document contains references to various FedEx services and charges, including transportation and special handling fees.
